publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2879 Michael Russell: Sportscotland Relocation to North Ayrshire-That the Parliament notes the requirement on sportscotland to consider relocating from Edinburgh; recognises the potential of North Ayrshire as a place for growth in government related jobs and the poor record to date of such job creation in the area; urges North Ayrshire Council to take positive and determined steps to attract such jobs and especially those that would be created by the move of sportscotland to the area; observes that sportscotland already has facilities in North Ayrshire, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to direct sportscotland to consider North Ayrshire as the preferred site for its relocation.
S1M-2879 Sportscotland Relocation to North Ayrshire (lodged on 12 March 2002) Kay Ullrich*
